alert.note: Alert for Central Chippewa; Western Chippewa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 08 at 2:40PM EST until January 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM SUNDAY TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow and blowing snow expected. Snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches is expected by Monday morning with an additional 2 to 5 inches through Monday afternoon bringing storm total snow accumulations 8 to 15 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph will likely lead to areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Western Chippewa and Central Chippewa Counties. * WHEN...From 4 AM Sunday to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will likely become very difficult. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
